target.name: pre.@dot
target.description: Called before source files are compiled.

target.name: post.@dot
target.description: Called at the end of the compilation target after the results are copied to the build result folder.

target.name: pre.gather.bin.parts
target.description: gather.bin.parts: This target copies the build results (i.e. the jars and any other files being included in the bundle) to the final destination directory. It is also the target where the version qualifiers are replaced in the manifest file (see Version Qualifiers). It supports pre.gather.bin.parts and post.gather.bin.parts targets.

target.name: post.gather.bin.parts
target.description: gather.bin.parts: This target copies the build results (i.e. the jars and any other files being included in the bundle) to the final destination directory. It is also the target where the version qualifiers are replaced in the manifest file (see Version Qualifiers). It supports pre.gather.bin.parts and post.gather.bin.parts targets.
